actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to prohibit commercial air tour operations over Yellowstone National Park and Grand Teton National Park.
short_title: Yellowstone and Teton Scenic Overflight Exclusion Act of 2001

summary.text: Yellowstone and Teton Scenic Overflight Exclusion Act of 2001 - Amends Federal transportation law to prohibit commercial air tour operation in the airspace over, or within one mile of the boundary of, Yellowstone National Park and Grand Teton National Park.

titles.title: Yellowstone and Teton Scenic Overflight Exclusion Act of 2001
A bill to prohibit commercial air tour operations over Yellowstone National Park and Grand Teton National Park.
